heading: Semester 1 Registration
body: Registration for Semester 1 of the 2025 academic year is now open. All students are advised to complete their registration by March 15th to avoid late fees.

heading: Mid-Semester Examinations
body: The mid-semester examination timetable has been released. Please check the student portal for your specific schedule and venue details.

heading: Degree Audit for Graduands
body: Potential graduands for the November 2025 ceremony are requested to verify their academic records with the Faculty Office before July 31st.
